data.message: Interesting how Eminem magically becomes a social justice warrior now that Trump is President. Yep, that's right... The same Eminem who talks shit about gays, wrote songs about shooting up with drugs in front of his daughter, raps about "kicking a pregnant bitch in the stomach", and lets not forget about Stan driving off a bridge with his pregnant girlfriend in the trunk (just a few examples).  Now all of a sudden this guy wants to act like he's offended by Trump when his own sole purpose in life is to be offensive.  He doesn't give a shit or a sloppy fuck about anyone other himself and selling his next album.  Do any of you understand what a rouse is?

replies.message: Wow u just showed u cant tell the difference between music and reality!😐
Lee Casteel well in reality eminem said all that in actual life.
guess what. “He still doesn’t give a fuck”
He’s a rapper how u gonna compare a rapper to the president like they should have the same morals

Martin Hasenauer what does being a rapper or a president have to do with him being a hypocrite? Doesn't change that fact.
Damien Marks yeah. He used to diss Hillary. Now he cries about Trump, all while stating false shit about him in his shitty "freestyle".
Remember Mosh? He always took hits at politics

I'm very impressed. I've never seen a retard write so many words before. You should be proud. Or was it your drunk dad in a wife beater cause he's a wife beater without a job who wrote all of this? Trump is a fucking tool, Em is an amazing artist. That shit is not even up for debate so just stfu.
Robert Walle Your a fuckin MORON!!! Amazing artist? BAHAHA
Eddie wichman?USA IS DEVIDED .you pick up just ONE SIDE .i guess that s the messagge .

There isn't any comparison between Eminem being a rapper & Trump being a president

Listen to the into of Criminal and maybe you'll comprehend things
